pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fit the Mixture of Experts Latent Position Cluster Model to Network Data // Functions to facilitate model-based clustering of nodes in a network in a mixture of experts setting, which incorporates covariate information on the nodes in the modelling process. Isobel Claire Gormley and Thomas Brendan Murphy (2010) doi:10.1016/j.stamet.2010.01.002.
